TopicTitle: Scott Manley's Introductory "Hullo!" Now Sounds Like "Hoo!"

Articles.Content:
I compared Scott Manley's earliest KSP videos to his latest ones, and in his older ones you can still distinctly hear him say "HULLO!" as he usually does at the start of his videos. But recently, I seem to be hearing him say "HOOOO!" in his newer videos...go ahead, check it. Just thought I'd say that and maybe also get some feedback. He's probably getting tired of repeating that intro hahaha

-snip-

Edited June 1, 2013 by KasperVld

I compared Scott Manley's earliest KSP videos to his latest ones, and in his older ones you can still distinctly hear him say "HULLO!" as he usually does at the start of his videos. But recently, I seem to be hearing him say "HOOOO!" in his newer videos...go ahead, check it. Just thought I'd say that and maybe also get some feedback. He's probably getting tired of repeating that intro hahaha

Additionally, one of his latest videos features his wife Amy. Which made me think this scenario...
